There you go Claunchii…A fixed wireframe, but I wont tell you how to fix it like this, just know it should look like this, fixing it is something you learn on your own as your modelling skills develop. Good luck!

item.title: Poison Curved Dagger
item.dc:creator: @h1_sk1ller h1 sk1ller
item.description:
@h1_sk1ller wrote:

[quote=“claunchii, post:19, topic:362127”][quote author=dylan_0789 link=topic=458416.msg3354402#msg3354402 date=1285646153]
Off topic: I didn’t get repped on my first model post here. That’s the difference between when Mopar wasn’t rep-whoring and now. You guys are seriously too easily pleased “oh hes trying, rep++” is stupid. The rep button was intended to be used when someone has contributed or shown off something which is reputable, and which he or she may be remembered for. Stop being rep-whores.

On topic: its great for a first model. Heres a tip: always strive to better your skill. Don’t create something for ‘practice,’ but create something to challenge your current skill and knowledge of the program. That is how your skills will develop.
[/quote]

Thanks, you’ve been most helpfull and Rep is just a number.[/quote]

It is pretty good for a new modeler you will do just great at moparscape so welcome

Read full topic

@dylan_0789 wrote:

Off topic: I didn’t get repped on my first model post here. That’s the difference between when Mopar wasn’t rep-whoring and now. You guys are seriously too easily pleased “oh hes trying, rep++” is stupid. The rep button was intended to be used when someone has contributed or shown off something which is reputable, and which he or she may be remembered for. Stop being rep-whores.

On topic: its great for a first model. Heres a tip: always strive to better your skill. Don’t create something for ‘practice,’ but create something to challenge your current skill and knowledge of the program. That is how your skills will develop.

item.title: Poison Curved Dagger
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“kirikugi, post:13, topic:362127”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=458416.msg3354390#msg3354390 date=1285645324]

You must understand OP that here at mopar modelling isn’t just looks, but efficiency. Quite an advanced rsps modelling section.

We used to be epic, then we sucked balls, now we’re epic again. You’re entering a challenging playing field. Just as long as you don’t recolor anything, you won’t get flamethrowered. Watch out for random spam/hater missles. Besides that, you’ll be good.
[/quote]

haha Yea …its almost like i have a bullseye painted right on my ass and they send the damn Airfourse after my ass lol i get flamed an trolled BIG TIME![/quote]

We all gotz are hertbeat senzors… maybi u shuld use ninjaz pro?

Read full topic

item.title: Poison Curved Dagger
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“claunchii, post:6, topic:362127”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=458416.msg3354357#msg3354357 date=1285644157]
WAYYYY to many faces. you don’t need the lines in the middle of the blade, just around the outside. The tip can be appeared to be poisoned once you triangulate, no need to mess up your wireframe. The sphere on the bottom is to detailed, the middle is a mess, and the blade looks really flat / weak.
[/quote]

Its super ultra titanium. IDC bout poly it will fit in a server its good to me… uhm i didnt know how to give it a poision effect so i did that last… Yeah, Goodnight. Wanderer i liked the handel like that thought it looked pretty smooth Blade is shit though might scale it wider, cheers. Wow everytime i try n’ post some1 new posts xD and i used knife tool quite a bit for the curves. Will work on handel tomorrow!

Edit** Wow when did i get 17 reP? last time i had 12 :O[/quote]
Glad you’re using the knife tool. Try to use it more… controllable… I find the knife tool gets me the minimum number of faces…

[quote=“kirikugi, post:7, topic:362127”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=458416.msg3354370#msg3354370 date=1285644517]

yea there are a few extra faces but YAY PRIMS that earns you a Rep++ but try to spice the handle up a bit…play with the knife tool (i like using the cut straight faces command …comes in handy with hilts and blades)

You are REALLLLLYY bad with rep control…[/quote]

Nahh…im just not a hard critic…ik when i started out i cudnt get rep worth a damn…so ik how he feels…and giving him rep gives him sorda a self esteem boost[/quote]
I got rep from my first model here… Pretty sure it was coonhunter… I think cuz I used prims though…

Read full topic

item.title: Poison Curved Dagger
item.dc:creator: @claunchii claunchii
item.description:
@claunchii wrote:

reyx7:

WAYYYY to many faces. you don’t need the lines in the middle of the blade, just around the outside. The tip can be appeared to be poisoned once you triangulate, no need to mess up your wireframe. The sphere on the bottom is to detailed, the middle is a mess, and the blade looks really flat / weak.

Its super ultra titanium. IDC bout poly it will fit in a server its good to me… uhm i didnt know how to give it a poision effect so i did that last… Yeah, Goodnight. Wanderer i liked the handel like that thought it looked pretty smooth Blade is shit though might scale it wider, cheers. Wow everytime i try n’ post some1 new posts xD and i used knife tool quite a bit for the curves. Will work on handel tomorrow!

Edit** Wow when did i get 17 reP? last time i had 12

Read full topic
